entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
